alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Randolph; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 9:05PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Randolph, northeastern Fulton and northeastern Sharp Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 905 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Salem in Fulton County, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cherokee Village... Salem in Fulton County... Mammoth Spring... Hardy... Ravenden Springs... Mammoth Spring State Park... Armstrong... Moko... Fryatt... Saddler Falls... Eleven Point... Wirth... Saddle... Ozark Acres... Salem Airport... Camp... Heart... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for eastern and north central Arkansas.
